021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.BukkitCalculationsProvider;
023import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.BukkitItemStack;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.BukkitPluginCore;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.hook.PAPIParser;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.impl.scheduler.BukkitScheduler;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.CmdSource;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ProxyProvider;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ServerConnector;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.helper.CraftingRecipe;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.SchedulerProvider;
034import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
035import org.bukkit.ChatColor;
036import org.bukkit.Material;
037import org.bukkit.NamespacedKey;
038import org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer;
039import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
040import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
041import org.bukkit.inventory.ShapedRecipe;
042import org.bukkit.inventory.ShapelessRecipe;
043import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
044import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
045import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.actor.BukkitCommandActor;
046import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
047
048import java.io.InputStream;
049import java.util.Map;
050import java.util.Optional;
051import java.util.Set;
052import java.util.UUID;
053import java.util.stream.Collectors;
054
055/**
056 * BukkitServerProvider
057 *
058 * @author creatorfromhell
059 * @since 0.1.2.0
060 */
061public class BukkitServerProvider implements ServerConnector {
062
063  protected final BukkitCalculationsProvider calc = new BukkitCalculationsProvider();
064  protected final BukkitProxyProvider proxy = new BukkitProxyProvider();
065
066  protected final BukkitScheduler scheduler;
067
068  protected String world = null;
069
070  public BukkitServerProvider() {
071
072    this.scheduler = new BukkitScheduler();
073  }
074
075  public BukkitServerProvider(final BukkitScheduler scheduler) {
076
077    this.scheduler = scheduler;
078  }
079
080  public void setDefaultWorld(final String world) {
081
082    this.world = world;
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public String name() {
087
088    return "bukkit";
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Used to replace placeholders from a string.
093   *
094   * @param player  The player to use for the placeholder replacement.
095   * @param message The message to replace placeholders in.
096   *
097   * @return The string after placeholders have been replaced.
098   */
099  @Override
100  public String replacePlaceholder(final UUID player, final String message) {
101
102    if(player == null) return message;
103
104    final Optional<PlayerProvider> playerOpt = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(player);
105    if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().isPluginEnabled("PlaceholderAPI") && playerOpt.isPresent()
106       && playerOpt.get() instanceof final BukkitPlayerProvider bukkitPlayer) {
107
108      return PAPIParser.parse(bukkitPlayer, message);
109    }
110    return message;
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * The proxy provider to use for this implementation.
115   *
116   * @return The proxy provider to use for this implementation.
117   */
118  @Override
119  public ProxyProvider proxy() {
120
121    return proxy;
122  }
123
124  /**
125   * Used to convert an {@link CommandActor} to a {@link CmdSource}.
126   *
127   * @param actor The command actor.
128   *
129   * @return The {@link CmdSource} for this actor.
130   */
131  @Override
132  public CmdSource<?> source(@NotNull final CommandActor actor) {
133
134    return new BukkitCMDSource((BukkitCommandActor)actor);
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Retrieves a set of online player names.
139   *
140   * @return Set of online player names.
141   */
142  @Override
143  public Set<String> onlinePlayersList() {
144
145    return Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers().stream()
146            .map(Player::getName)
147            .collect(Collectors.toSet());
148  }
149
150  /**
151   * Used to get the amount of online players.
152   *
153   * @return The amount of online players.
154   */
155  @Override
156  public int onlinePlayers() {
157
158    return Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers().size();
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * Attempts to find a {@link PlayerProvider player} based on an {@link UUID identifier}.
163   *
164   * @param identifier The identifier
165   *
166   * @return An Optional containing the located {@link PlayerProvider player}, or an empty Optional
167   * if no player is located.
168   */
169  @Override
170  public Optional<PlayerProvider> findPlayer(@NotNull final UUID identifier) {
171
172    return Optional.of(BukkitPlayerProvider.find(identifier.toString()));
173  }
174
175  /**
176   * This is used to return an instance of an {@link PlayerProvider player} based on the provided
177   * instance's player object.
178   *
179   * @param player The instance of the player.
180   *
181   * @return The initialized {@link PlayerProvider player object}.
182   */
183  @Override
184  public PlayerProvider initializePlayer(@NotNull final Object player) {
185
186    if(player instanceof final Player playerObj) {
187      return new BukkitPlayerProvider(playerObj);
188    }
189    return null;
190  }
191
192  /**
193   * Creates a custom texture for a specific UUID.
194   *
195   * @param identifier The UUID to create the custom texture for.
196   * @param username   The username of the profile for which the custom texture is being created.
197   * @param texture    The custom texture data to apply to the profile.
198   */
199  @Override
200  public void createCustomTexture(final UUID identifier, final String username, final String texture) {
201    //TODO: This
202  }
203
204  /**
205   * Used to determine if this player has played on this server before.
206   *
207   * @param uuid The {@link UUID} that is associated with the player.
208   *
209   * @return True if the player has played on the server before, otherwise false.
210   */
211  @Override
212  public boolean playedBefore(final UUID uuid) {
213
214    final OfflinePlayer player = Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(uuid);
215    return player.hasPlayedBefore();
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Used to determine if a player with the specified username has played before.
220   *
221   * @param name The username to search for.
222   *
223   * @return True if someone with the specified username has played before, otherwise false.
224   */
225  @Override
226  public boolean playedBefore(final String name) {
227
228    final OfflinePlayer player = Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(name);
229    return player.hasPlayedBefore();
230  }
231
232  /**
233   * Used to determine if a player with the specified username is online.
234   *
235   * @param name The username to search for.
236   *
237   * @return True if someone with the specified username is online.
238   */
239  @Override
240  public boolean online(final String name) {
241
242    try {
243
244      final UUID id = UUID.fromString(name);
245      return Bukkit.getPlayer(id) != null;
246    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
247      return Bukkit.getPlayer(name) != null;
248    }
249  }
250
251  @Override
252  public Optional<UUID> fromName(final String name) {
253
254    for(final OfflinePlayer player : Bukkit.getServer().getOfflinePlayers()) {
255      if(player.getName() == null) continue;
256      if(player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
257        return Optional.of(player.getUniqueId());
258      }
259    }
260    return Optional.empty();
261  }
262
263  /**
264   * Used to locate a username for a specific name. This could be called from either a primary or
265   * secondary thread, and should not call back to the Mojang API ever.
266   *
267   * @param id The {@link UUID} to use for the search.
268   *
269   * @return An optional containing the name if exists, otherwise false.
270   */
271  @Override
272  public Optional<String> fromID(final UUID id) {
273
274    for(final OfflinePlayer player : Bukkit.getServer().getOfflinePlayers()) {
275      if(player.getUniqueId().equals(id)) {
276        return Optional.ofNullable(player.getName());
277      }
278    }
279    return Optional.empty();
280  }
281
282  /**
283   * Returns the name of the default world.
284   *
285   * @return The name of the default world.
286   */
287  @Override
288  public String defaultWorld() {
289
290    if(world == null) {
291      world = Bukkit.getServer().getWorlds().get(0).getName();
292    }
293    return world;
294    /*
295
296    if(world == null) {
297
298      final Properties props = new Properties();
299      try {
300
301        props.load(new FileInputStream(new File(".", "server.properties")));
302      } catch(IOException ignore) {
303      }
304      world = props.getProperty("level-name");
305    }
306    return world;*/
307  }
308
309  /**
310   * Determines if a plugin with the correlating name is currently installed.
311   *
312   * @param name The name to use for our check.
313   *
314   * @return True if a plugin with that name exists, otherwise false.
315   */
316  @Override
317  public boolean pluginAvailable(final String name) {
318
319    return Bukkit.getPluginManager().isPluginEnabled(name);
320  }
321
322  /**
323   * Used to replace colour codes in a string.
324   *
325   * @param string The string to format.
326   * @param strip  If true, the color codes are striped from the string.
327   *
328   * @return The formatted string.
329   */
330  @Override
331  public String replaceColours(final String string, final boolean strip) {
332
333    if(strip) {
334      return ChatColor.stripColor(string);
335    }
336    return ChatColor.translateAlternateColorCodes('&', string);
337  }
338
339  @Override
340  public AbstractItemStack<?> stackBuilder() {
341
342    return new BukkitItemStack();
343  }
344
345  @Override
346  public void saveResource(final String path, final boolean replace) {
347
348    BukkitPluginCore.instance().getPlugin().saveResource(path, replace);
349  }
350
351  /**
352   * Retrieves an input stream for the specified filename from the resources.
353   *
354   * @param filename The name of the file to retrieve from the resources. Cannot be null.
355   *
356   * @return An input stream for the specified file, or null if the file is not found in the
357   * resources.
358   */
359  @Override
360  public @Nullable InputStream getResource(@NotNull final String filename) {
361
362    return BukkitPluginCore.instance().getPlugin().getResource(filename);
363  }
364
365  /**
366   * Provides this implementation's {@link SchedulerProvider scheduler}.
367   *
368   * @return The scheduler for this implementation.
369   */
370  @Override
371  public SchedulerProvider<?> scheduler() {
372
373    return scheduler;
374  }
375
376  /**
377   * Used to register a crafting recipe to the server.
378   *
379   * @param key    The key for the crafting recipe to be registered.
380   * @param recipe The crafting recipe to register.
381   *
382   * @see CraftingRecipe
383   */
384  @Override
385  public void registerCrafting(@NotNull final String key, @NotNull final CraftingRecipe recipe) {
386
387    if(recipe.isShaped()) {
388      ShapedRecipe shaped;
389
390      try {
391        shaped = new ShapedRecipe(new NamespacedKey(BukkitPluginCore.instance().getPlugin(), key), (ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
392      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
393        shaped = new ShapedRecipe((ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
394      }
395
396      shaped.shape(recipe.getRows());
397
398      for(final Map.Entry<Character, String> ingredient : recipe.getIngredients().entrySet()) {
399        shaped.setIngredient(ingredient.getKey(), Material.valueOf(ingredient.getValue()));
400      }
401      Bukkit.getServer().addRecipe(shaped);
402    } else {
403      ShapelessRecipe shapeless;
404
405      try {
406        shapeless = new ShapelessRecipe(new NamespacedKey(BukkitPluginCore.instance().getPlugin(), key), (ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
407      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
408        shapeless = new ShapelessRecipe((ItemStack)recipe.getResult().cacheLocale());
409      }
410
411      for(final Map.Entry<Character, String> ingredient : recipe.getIngredients().entrySet()) {
412        shapeless.addIngredient(1, Material.valueOf(ingredient.getValue()));
413      }
414      Bukkit.getServer().addRecipe(shapeless);
415    }
416  }
417
418  @Override
419  public BukkitCalculationsProvider calculations() {
420
421    return calc;
422  }
423}
